dialogue.introduction: Akigumo, reporting for duty~ Look after me Admiral~
dialogue.library_intro: Yokosuka born and raised, I'm Akigumo! I'm in the the Kagerou-class, but my (overwhelming) cruising range caught the eye of Adm. Nagumo and so I joined the 1st CarDiv. I mean, I always thought I was a Yuugumo-class... (even our uniforms are the same)... *grumble, mutter*... ah, whatever. After that, I was assigned to guard the 5th CarDiv. I didn't get to finish drawing Shoukaku and Zuikaku, though...
dialogue.secretary2: Hmmh~mm. If you want to play with me that much, then why don't I sketch you? If you look at it this way, you can see the artistic sensibilities! Hmmh~mm♪
dialogue.secretary3: What what? Sexual harrasment? Is that okay?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Waaaa! That's it! It's almost the submission deadline, isn't it! I can't just sit around!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, are you beat? Well then, Akigumo will draw a picture of you♪
dialogue.wedding: At last the Admiral has been caught by my charm~? Ju~st kidding! But I wonder what kind of picture the future of me and the Admiral would be… Should I seriously try drawing a thin book? Wouldn't it be great?
dialogue.show_players_score: A report has arrived for the Admiral. Hmm, gonna read it?
dialogue.equipment2: Mmm, yeah, equipment is important, you know.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Even Akigumo needs some repairs, yeah? I'll draw an illustration in the bath~
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Going for a long bath~. Geez, those guys~ After I'm fixed, I'll return it twice over!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new shipdaughter~ Admiral likes them too, yeah?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has come back. Good work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: You wanna order one of my illustrations?
dialogue.battle_start: All of you who are waiting, welcome!
dialogue.attack: Battleship class... I wanna beat them up~
dialogue.night_battle: The night's so dark that I can't draw very well, you know~ Let's fire up the searchlights!
dialogue.night_attack: Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
dialogue.mvp: Lo~ok, I can do things that even battleships and heavy cruisers can't, you know. Oh, do you have a sketchbook?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Woah! A hit like this won't penetrate me!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I won't able to draw like this~!
dialogue.sunk: Hey, my resting place... will anybody sketch it out...

hourly.0000: It's 0 o'clock. Are you okay? You ain't spacing out?
hourly.0100: 1 at night, looks like you're still going, yeah?
hourly.0200: It's 2 o'clock, I'm a night owl too, so it's fine~ I'll stay with you while I write out a manuscript!
hourly.0300: It's 3 o'clock, but... are you alright? Will you be okay at your job tomorrow?
hourly.0400: It's 4 A.M. At resting times you rest! At drawing times you draw! That's what the great circles do, yeah?
hourly.0500: 5 A.M... And that's why I sleep from morning to mid~day...Zzz
hourly.0600: It's finally 6 in the Morning, huh.... Admiral~ I'm gonna borrow a futon~ G'night~
hourly.0700: 7o'clock... As I feared, it's bright so I can't sleep... What ever will I do...
hourly.0800: 8 o'clock. I'll be able to do a manuscript 'cause I ate breakfast... Admiral, bread or rice in the morning, what kinda guy are you?
hourly.0900: 9 o'clock, huh... a~nyway, flipping around the front cover and submit first and then off for training!
hourly.1000: It's now 10 o'clock~ Are you making progress on your work, Admiral?
hourly.1100: 11. With that said, Admiral, what kind of girl do you like the most?
hourly.1200: Lunch~! When this time comes around, it's UkiUkiWatching time!... Ah, d-don't mind me...
hourly.1300: 1 P.M... 'Lunch time' somehow sounds fun, yeah?... What'cha eating?
hourly.1400: 2 P.M... Well, let's do the afternoon sortie!
hourly.1500: 3 P.M! Admiral Ranks, check 'em! It'd be great if it's gone up, yes?
hourly.1600: 4 P.M. Almost time for the sun to go down... If it gets dark, you can't really draw, you know?
hourly.1700: 5 P.M. Hah-... Even though I'm, always fighting, I somehow really want to draw a carrier sinking... Why?
hourly.1800: 6 P.M... I'm hungry~ I wanna eat canned beef, yeah, canned beef... Admiral, open up a can, will ya?
hourly.1900: 7 P.M. Yeah, canned beef with silver chalis is great!
hourly.2000: 8 P.M... For this evening's performance, of course the searchlight will be lit!
hourly.2100: 9 P.M. Makigumo's 'Sleep, Sleep!' is so annoying~. Why does she do it?
hourly.2200: 10 P.M. I'm tired, so I just be borrowing a futon~ Getting in with me is for.bid.den!
hourly.2300: 11 P.M. Just a moment's sleep! Zzzz~... This is just practice, one more time.... Admiral, you too.. go sleep!
